name: Trial Of The Cyclops
description:
Trial of the cyclops is a short game where you have 10 minutes to gather resources from your surrounding and he cave below in order to craft weapons, armor, and potions in order to defeat the Cyclops. It takes roughly 15 to 30 minutes to play through and can be played with just the keyboard or a controller.

How To Play Keyboard

WASD/ARROWS to walk around
SHIFT - Sprint
C/SPACE - Swing or interact
X - Roll
V -Lock On

Controller

Left Stick/D Pad - Move
R2 - Swing/Interact
A - Roll
B - Sprint
X - Lock On

Credits

Sam Drugan: Programming, design & Art
William Waldron: Music
Shapeforms Audio: Sound Effects
Fonts: Eeve Somepx
